overview:
Dr. Mohler is a co-founder of the company, a prostate cancer surgeon and leads an active research program in androgen deprivation therapy.

He is Chairman of the Department of Urologic Oncology and Co-Leader of the Prostate Program at Roswell Park Cancer Institute and a Professor in the Department of Urology at SUNY-Buffalo.

He and Dr. Smith have collaborated for over 15 years on research programs in prostate disease.

He has co-authored over 120 peer reviewed publications and is an editor and reviewer for a number of clinical research journals. He is a scientific advisor to several pharmaceutical and biotechnology companies with programs in prostate disease.
